title: Massachusetts Firm Recalls Raw Boneless Turkey Breasts Due To Misbranding and Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, July 26, 2014 Puritan Foods Co., Inc., a Boston, Mass., establishment, is recalling approximately 2,476 pounds of raw boneless turkey breasts due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains...
impacted_products: Raw Boneless Turkey Breasts (various weights) with pack dates of June 11 and July 18, 2014
